email_chain.subject: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment: MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear Jane,

I hope this message finds you well. We are pleased to provide a freight quote for the shipment of 50,000 MT of coal from Newcastle, Australia, to Qingdao, China, under CIF terms. The vessel proposed is MV OCEAN STAR, with a DWT of 82,000 and LOA of 225 meters.

Our starting quote is USD 25.50 per metric ton. The vessel is available for loading from October 20 to October 25. Please let us know if this works for you or if you require any adjustments.

Best regards,
John Doe
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment: MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Thank you for the prompt response. The rate of USD 25.50 seems a bit high given the current market conditions. Could you consider revising the rate to USD 24.00 per MT? Additionally, could you confirm the demurrage rate and the laycan period?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best regards,
Jane Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Revised Freight Quote for Coal Shipment: MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear Jane,

Thank you for your feedback. After reviewing the market conditions, we are willing to adjust the rate to USD 24.50 per MT. The demurrage rate is USD 15,000 per day, pro rata, and the laycan period remains October 20-25.

Please let us know if this revised rate is acceptable so we can proceed with the necessary arrangements.

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Revised Freight Quote for Coal Shipment: MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Thank you for the revised quote. We accept the rate of USD 24.50 per MT. Could you please confirm the vessel's ETA at Qingdao and provide the charter party for review?

Best regards,
Jane Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Confirmation and Charter Party for MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear Jane,

Thank you for your confirmation. The ETA at Qingdao is estimated to be November 5, 2023, assuming loading is completed within the laycan period. Attached is the charter party for your review. Please let us know if any adjustments are needed.

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Confirmation and Charter Party for MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

The charter party looks good. We will proceed as agreed. Thank you for your assistance and prompt responses throughout this negotiation.

Best regards,
Jane Smith
